A mysterious figure appears and announces that they are the Snoring Sun Assistant.
The assistant explains that the sun has been cursed by a wicked witch, causing it to fall into a deep slumber.
The assistant reveals that the only way to wake the sun is to collect the sun's three favorite things.
The assistant tasks the main character with the task of finding the sun's favorite things.
The main character embarks on a journey to find the sun's favorite things, encountering various obstacles along the way.
